name: Block Breaker (Cdigglesworth)
description:
Block Breaker WebGL Build v1.2

This is a section from a Unity C# course I am taking on Udemy. The section I am currently on taught me how to make an Arkanoid clone.

This is my first graphical game and features the following concepts:

  • Game Menu
  • Persistant Background Music
  • Custom Sound Effects
  • Lives
  • Multiple Levels
  • Programmatically Instantiating Objects
  • Custom Sprites
  • Basic Physics

It is fairly simplistic, but I am just learning the basics. Please test it out and let me know what you think. Any feedback is appreciated. Also if you identify any bugs, please report them as well.

Thanks and Enjoy!
